alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 9:07PM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. The heaviest snow will fall between 11 pm tonight and sunrise Saturday. * WHERE...Eastern San Juan Mountains above 10000 feet. * WHEN...Through 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains Above 10000 Ft
